name: FpRetx87FpOps
description: The number of x87 floating-point Ops that have retired.

units.name: DivSqrROps
units.description: Divide and square root Ops.

units.name: MulOps
units.description: Multiply Ops.

units.name: AddSubOps
units.description: Add/subtract Ops.

name: FpRetSseAvxOps
description: This is a retire-based event. The number of retired SSE/AVX FLOPs. The number of events logged per cycle can vary from 0 to 64. This event requires the use of the MergeEvent since it can count above 15 events per cycle. See 2.1.13.3 [Large Increment per Cycle Events]. It does not provide a useful count without the use of the MergeEvent.

units.name: BfloatMacFLOPs
units.description: bfloat Multiply-Accumulate FLOPs.  Each bfloat MAC operation is counted as 2 FLOPS.

units.name: MacFLOPs
units.description: Multiply-Accumulate FLOPs.  Each MAC operation is counted as 2 FLOPS.  This event does not include bfloat MAC operations.

units.name: DivFLOPs
units.description: Divide/square root FLOPs.

units.name: MultFLOPs
units.description: Multiply FLOPs.

units.name: AddSubFLOPs
units.description: Add/subtract FLOPs.

name: FpRetiredSerOps
description: The number of serializing Ops retired.

units.name: SseBotRet
units.description: SSE/AVX bottom-executing ops retired.

units.name: SseCtrlRet
units.description: SSE/AVX control word mispredict traps.

units.name: X87BotRet
units.description: x87 bottom-executing ops retired.

units.name: X87CtrlRet
units.description: x87 control word mispredict traps due to mispredictions in RC or PC, or changes in Exception Mask bits.

units.name: Pack512uOpsRetired
units.description: Number of packed 512-bit ops retired.

units.name: Pack256uOpsRetired
units.description: Number of packed 256-bit ops retired.

units.name: Pack128uOpsRetired
units.description: Number of packed 128-bit ops retired.

units.name: ScalaruOpsRetired
units.description: Number of scalar ops retired.

units.name: MMXuOpsRetired
units.description: Number of MMX ops retired.

units.name: x87uOpsRetired
units.description: Number of x87 ops retired.

name: FpOpsRetiredByType
description: Note: Shuffle op counts may count for instructions that are not necessarily thought of as including shuffles. For example, Horizontal Add, Dot Product, and certain MOV instructions may include or use only shuffle type ops.

name: SseAvxOpsRetired
description: Note: Shuffle op counts may count for instructions that are not necessarily thought of as including shuffles. For example, Horizontal Add, Dot Product, and certain MOV instructions may include or use only shuffle type ops.

name: FpPackOpsRetired
description: Note: Shuffle op counts may count for instructions that are not necessarily thought of as including shuffles. For example, Horizontal Add, Dot Product, and certain MOV instructions may include or use only shuffle type ops.

name: PackedIntOpType
description: Note: Shuffle op counts may count for instructions that are not necessarily thought of as including shuffles. For example, Horizontal Add, Dot Product, and certain MOV instructions may include or use only shuffle type ops. This event also counts FP data type packed and scalar MOV and shuffle.

name: FpDispFaults
description: Floating-point Dispatch Faults.

units.name: YmmSpillFault
units.description: YMM Spill fault.

units.name: YmmFillFault
units.description: YMM Fill fault.

units.name: XmmFillFault
units.description: XMM Fill fault.

units.name: x87FillFault
units.description: x87 Fill fault.

units.name: StliOther
units.description: Store-to-load conflicts: A load was unable to complete due to a non-forwardable conflict with an older store. Most commonly, a load's address range partially but not completely overlaps with an uncompleted older store. Software can avoid this problem by using same-size and same-alignment loads and stores when accessing the same data. Vector/SIMD code is particularly susceptible to this problem; software should construct wide vector stores by manipulating vector elements in registers using shuffle/blend/swap instructions prior to storing to memory, instead of using narrow element-by-element stores.

units.name: BusLock
units.description: Comparable to legacy bus lock.

name: LsRetClClush
description: The number of retired CLFLUSH instructions. This is a non-speculative event.

name: LsRetCpuid
description: The number of CPUID instructions retired.

name: LsDispatch
description: Counts the number of operations dispatched to the LS unit. Unit Masks events are ADDed.

units.name: LdStDispatch
units.description: Load-op-Store Dispatch.  Dispatch of a single op that performs a load from and store to the same memory address.

units.name: StoreDispatch
units.description: Dispatch of a single op that performs a memory store.

units.name: LdDispatch
units.description: Dispatch of a single op that performs a memory load.

name: LsSmiRx
description: Counts the number of SMIs received.

name: LsIntTaken
description: Counts the number of interrupts taken.

units.name: IntTaken
units.description: Number of Interrupts taken. This event is also counted when UnitMask[7:0]=0.

name: LsSTLF
description: Number of STLF hits.

units.name: StCommitCancelWcbFull
units.description: A non-cacheable store and the non-cacheable commit buffer is full.

name: LsMabAlloc
description: Counts when a LS pipe allocates a MAB entry.

name: LsDmndFillsFromSys
summary: Demand Data Cache Fills by Data Source
description: Demand Data Cache Fills by Data Source.

units.name: AlternateMemories_NearFar
units.description: Requests that return from Extension Memory.

units.name: Dram_IO_Far
units.description: Requests that target another NUMA node and return from DRAM or MMIO from another NUMA node, either from the same or different socket.

units.name: FarCache_NearFar
units.description: Requests that return from another CCX cache in a different NUMA node.

units.name: Dram_IO_Near
units.description: Requests that target the same NUMA node and return from either DRAM or MMIO in the same NUMA node.

units.name: NearCache_NearFar
units.description: Requests that return from another CCX cache in the same NUMA node.

units.name: LocalCcx
units.description: Data returned from L3 or different L2 in the same CCX.

units.name: LocalL2
units.description: Data returned from the local L2.

name: LsAnyFillsFromSys
summary: Any Data Cache Fills by Data Source
description: Any Data Cache Fills by Data Source.

units.name: AlternateMemories_NearFar
units.description: Requests that return from Extension Memory.

units.name: Dram_IO_Far
units.description: Requests that target another NUMA node and return from DRAM or MMIO from another NUMA node, either from the same or different socket.

units.name: FarCache_NearFar
units.description: Requests that return from another CCX cache in a different NUMA node.

units.name: Dram_IO_Near
units.description: Requests that target the same NUMA node and return from either DRAM or MMIO in the same NUMA node.

units.name: ExtCacheLocal
units.description: Requests that return from another CCX cache in the same NUMA node.

units.name: LocalCcx
units.description: Data returned from L3 or different L2 in the same CCX.

units.name: LocalL2
units.description: Data returned from the local L2.

units.name: TlbReload1GL2Miss
units.description: DTLB reload to a 1-G page that also missed in the L2 TLB.

units.name: TlbReload2ML2Miss
units.description: DTLB reload to a 2-M page that also missed in the L2 TLB.

units.name: TlbReloadCoalescedPageMiss
units.description: DTLB reload to a coalesced page that also missed in the L2 TLB.

units.name: TlbReload4KL2Miss
units.description: DTLB reload to a 4-K page that missed the L2 TLB.

units.name: TlbReload1GL2Hit
units.description: DTLB reload to a 1-G page that hit in the L2 TLB.

units.name: TlbReload2ML2Hit
units.description: DTLB reload to a 2-M page that hit in the L2 TLB.

units.name: TlbReloadCoalescedPageHit
units.description: DTLB reload to a coalesced page that hit in the L2 TLB.

units.name: TlbReload4KL2Hit
units.description: DTLB reload to a 4-K page that hit in the L2 TLB.

units.name: MA4K
units.description: The number of 4-KB misaligned (i.e., page crossing) loads.

units.name: MA64
units.description: The number of 64-B misaligned (i.e., cacheline crossing) loads.

name: LsPrefInstrDisp
description: Software Prefetch Instructions Dispatched (Speculative).

units.name: PREFETCHNTA
units.description: PrefetchNTA instruction. See docAPM3 PREFETCHlevel.

units.name: PREFETCHW
units.description: PrefetchW instruction. See docAPM3 PREFETCHW.

units.name: PREFETCH
units.description: PrefetchT0, T1 and T2 instructions. See docAPM3 PREFETCHlevel.

name: LsWcbCloseFlush
description: UnitMask events ADDed.  Multible WCB can report events at the same time.

units.name: FullLine64B
units.description: All 64 bytes of the WCB entry have been written.

name: LsInefSwPref
description: The number of software prefetches that did not fetch data outside of the processor core.

units.name: MabMchCnt
units.description: Software PREFETCH instruction saw a match on an already-allocated miss request buffer.

units.name: DataPipeSwPfDcHit
units.description: Software PREFETCH instruction saw a DC hit.

name: LsSwPfDcFills
description: Software Prefetch Data Cache Fills by Data Source.

units.name: AlternateMemories_NearFar
units.description: Requests that return from Extension Memory.

units.name: Dram_IO_Far
units.description: Requests that target another NUMA node and return from DRAM or MMIO from another NUMA node, either from the same or different socket.

units.name: FarCache_NearFar
units.description: Requests that return from another CCX cache in a different NUMA node.

units.name: Dram_IO_Near
units.description: Requests that target the same NUMA node and return from either DRAM or MMIO in the same NUMA node.

units.name: NearCache_NearFar
units.description: Requests that return from another CCX cache in the same NUMA node.

units.name: LocalCcx
units.description: Data returned from L3 or different L2 in the same CCX.

units.name: LocalL2
units.description: Data returned from the local L2.

name: LsHwPfDcFills
description: Hardware Prefetch Data Cache Fills by Data Source.

units.name: AlternateMemories_NearFar
units.description: Requests that return from Extension Memory.

units.name: Dram_IO_Far
units.description: Requests that target another NUMA node and return from DRAM or MMIO from another NUMA node, either from the same or different socket.

units.name: FarCache_NearFar
units.description: Requests that return from another CCX cache in a different NUMA node.

units.name: Dram_IO_Near
units.description: Requests that target the same NUMA node and return from either DRAM or MMIO in the same NUMA node.

units.name: NearCache_NearFar
units.description: Requests that return from another CCX cache in the same NUMA node.

units.name: LocalCcx
units.description: Data returned from L3 or different L2 in the same CCX.

units.name: LocalL2
units.description: Data returned from the local L2.

name: LsAllocMabCount
description: This event counts the in-flight L1 data cache misses (allocated Miss Address Buffers) each cycle.

name: LsNotHaltedP0Cyc
summary: P0 Freq Cycles not in Halt

units.name: P0FreqCyc
units.description: Counts at the P0 frequency (same as Core::X86::Msr::MPERF) when not in Halt.

name: IcCacheFillL2
description: The number of 64-byte instruction cache lines fulfilled from the L2 cache.

name: IcCacheFillSys
description: The number of 64-byte instruction cache line fulfilled from system memory or another cache.

name: BpL1TlbMissL2TlbHit
summary: L1 ITLB Miss, L2 ITLB Hit
description: The number of instruction fetches that miss in the L1 ITLB but hit in the L2 ITLB.

name: BpL1TlbMissL2TlbMiss
description: The number of valid fills into the ITLB originating from the LS Page-Table Walker. Tablewalk requests are issued for L1-ITLB and L2-ITLB misses.

units.name: Coalesced4K
units.description: Walk for >4-K Coalesced page.

units.name: IF1G
units.description: Walk for 1-G page.

units.name: IF2M
units.description: Walk for 2-M page.

units.name: IF4K
units.description: Walk to 4-K page.

name: BpL2BTBCorrect
summary: L2 Branch Prediction Overrides Existing Prediction (speculative)

name: BpDynIndPred
description: The number of times a branch used the indirect predictor to make a prediction.

name: BpDeReDirect
description: The number of times the instruction decoder overrides the predicted target.

name: BpL1TlbFetchHit
summary: L1 TLB Hits for Instruction Fetch
description: The number of instruction fetches that hit in the L1 ITLB.

units.name: IF1G
units.description: L1 Instruction TLB hit (1-G page size).

units.name: IF2M
units.description: L1 Instruction TLB hit (2-M page size).

units.name: IF4K
units.description: L1 Instruction TLB hit (4-K or 16-K page size).

name: ResyncsOrNcRedirects
description: Counts the number of HW resyncs (pipeline restarts) or NC redirects. NC redirects occur when the front-end transitions to fetching from UC (un-cacheable) memory.

name: IcTagHitMiss
description: Counts various IC tag related hit and miss events.

name: OpCacheHitMiss
description: Counts Op Cache micro-tag hit/miss events.

name: DeOpQueueEmpty
description: Cycles where the Op Queue is empty.

name: DeSrcOpDisp
summary: Source of Op Dispatched From Decoder
description: Counts the number of ops dispatched from the decoder classified by op source.

units.name: LoopBuffer
units.description: Count of ops dispatched from Loop Buffer.

units.name: OpCache
units.description: Count of ops fetched from Op Cache and dispatched.

units.name: Decoder
units.description: Count of ops fetched from Instruction Cache and dispatched.

name: DeDisOpsFromDecoder
summary: Types of Ops Dispatched From Decoder
description: Counts the number of ops dispatched from the decoder classified by op type. The UnitMask value encodes which types of ops are counted.

name: DeDisDispatchTokenStalls1
description: Cycles where a dispatch group is valid but does not get dispatched due to a Token Stall. UnitMask bits select the stall types included in the count.

units.name: FpFlushRecoveryStall
units.description: Counts FP Flush Recovery stall cycles.

units.name: FPSchRsrcStall
units.description: Counts FP Scheduler token stall cycles.

units.name: FpRegFileRsrcStall
units.description: Counts FP Register File token stall cycles. This applies to all ops that have an FP or SIMD destination register.

units.name: TakenBrnchBufferRsrc
units.description: Counts Taken Branch Buffer token stall cycles.

units.name: StoreQueueRsrcStall
units.description: Store Queue resource stall. Counts Store Queue token stall cycles.

units.name: LoadQueueRsrcStall
units.description: Load Queue resource stall. Counts Load Queue token stall cycles.

units.name: IntPhyRegFileRsrcStall
units.description: Integer Physical Register File resource stall. Counts Integer PRF token stall cycles. This applies to all ops that have an integer destination register.

name: DeDisDispatchTokenStalls2
description: Cycles where a dispatch group is valid but does not get dispatched due to a token stall. UnitMask bits select the stall types included in the count.

units.name: RetireTokenStall
units.description: Counts Retire Queue token stall cycles.

units.name: IntSch3TokenStall
units.description: Counts Integer Scheduler Queue 3 token stall cycles.

units.name: IntSch2TokenStall
units.description: Counts Integer Scheduler Queue 2 token stall cycles.

units.name: IntSch1TokenStall
units.description: Counts Integer Scheduler Queue 1 token stall cycles.

units.name: IntSch0TokenStall
units.description: Counts Integer Scheduler Queue 0 token stall cycles.

name: DeNoDispatchPerSlot
description: Counts the number of dispatch slots (each cycle) that remained unused for reasons selected by StallReason.

values.description: Counts dispatch slots left empty because the front-end did not supply ops.
Counts ops unable to dispatch due to back-end stalls.
Counts ops unable to dispatch because the dispatch cycle was granted to the other SMT thread.

name: DeAdditionalResourceStalls
description: This PMC event counts additional resource stalls that are not captured by Core::X86::Pmc::Core::DeDisDispatchTokenStalls1 or Core::X86::Pmc::Core::DeDisDispatchTokenStalls2.

values.description: Counts additional cycles dispatch is stalled due to the lack of dispatch resources

name: ExRetInstr
description: The number of instructions retired.

name: ExRetOps
description: The number of macro-ops retired.

name: ExRetBrn
description: The number of branch instructions retired. This includes all types of architectural control flow changes, including exceptions and interrupts.

name: ExRetBrnMisp
description: The number of retired branch instructions, that were mispredicted.

name: ExRetBrnTkn
description: The number of taken branches that were retired. This includes all types of architectural control flow changes, including exceptions and interrupts.

name: ExRetBrnTknMisp
description: The number of retired taken branch instructions that were mispredicted.

name: ExRetBrnFar
description: The number of far control transfers retired including far call/jump/return, IRET, SYSCALL and SYSRET, plus exceptions and interrupts. Far control transfers are not subject to branch prediction.

name: ExRetNearRet
description: The number of near return instructions (RET or RET Iw) retired.

name: ExRetNearRetMispred
description: The number of near returns retired that were not correctly predicted by the return address predictor. Each such mispredict incurs the same penalty as a mispredicted conditional branch instruction.

name: ExRetBrnIndMisp
description: The number of indirect branches retired that were not correctly predicted. Each such mispredict incurs the same penalty as a mispredicted conditional branch instruction. Note that only EX mispredicts are counted.

name: ExRetMmxFpInstr
description: The number of MMX, SSE or x87 instructions retired. The UnitMask allows the selection of the individual classes of instructions as given in the table. Each increment represents one complete instruction. Since this event includes non- numeric instructions it is not suitable for measuring MFLOPs.

units.name: SseInstr
units.description: SSE instructions (SSE, SSE2, SSE3, SSSE3, SSE4A, SSE41, SSE42, AVX).

units.name: MmxInstr
units.description: MMX instructions.

units.name: X87Instr
units.description: x87 instructions.

name: ExRetIndBrchInstr
description: The number of indirect branches retired.

name: ExNoRetire
description: This event counts cycles when the hardware thread does not retire any ops for reasons selected by UnitMask[4:0].  UnitMask events [4:0] are mutually exclusive. If multiple reasons apply for a given cycle, the lowest numbered UnitMask event is counted.

values.description: Load and ALU completion is considered for UnitMask[1]:NotComplete events.
Only missing load completion is considered for UnitMask[1]:NotComplete events.

units.name: ThreadNotSelected
units.description: The number cycles where ops could have retired (i.e. did not fall into UnitMask events [0]...[3]). but did not retire because thread arbitration did not select the thread for retire.

units.name: Other
units.description: The number of cycles where ops could have retired (self and older ops are complete), but were stopped from retirement for other reasons: retire breaks, traps, faults, etc.

units.name: NotComplete
units.description: The number of cycles where the oldest retire slot did not have its completion bits set.

units.name: Empty
units.description: The number of cycles when there were no valid ops in the retire queue. This may be caused by front-end bottlenecks or pipeline redirects.

name: ExRetUcodeInstr
description: Retired Microcoded Instructions.

name: ExRetUcodeOps
description: The number of microcode ops that have retired.

name: ExRetMsprdBrnchInstrDirMsmtch
summary: Retired Mispredicted Branch Instructions due to Direction Mismatch
description: The number of retired conditional branch instructions that were not correctly predicted because of a branch direction mismatch.

name: ExRetUncondBrnchInstrMispred
summary: Retired Unconditional Indirect Branch Instructions Mispredicted
description: The number of retired unconditional indirect branch instructions that were mispredicted.

name: ExRetUncondBrnchInstr
description: The number of retired unconditional branch instructions.

name: ExTaggedIbsOps
description: Counts Op IBS related events.

units.name: IbsCountRollover
units.description: Number of times an op could not be tagged by IBS because of a previous tagged op that has not retired.

units.name: IbsTaggedOpsRet
units.description: Number of Ops tagged by IBS that retired.

units.name: IbsTaggedOps
units.description: Number of Ops tagged by IBS.

name: ExRetFusedInstr
description: Counts retired fused instructions.

name: L2RequestG1
description: All L2 Cache Requests (Breakdown 1 - Common)

units.name: RdBlkL
units.description: Data Cache Reads (including hardware and software prefetch).

units.name: RdBlkX
units.description: Data Cache Stores.

units.name: LsRdBlkC_S
units.description: Data Cache Shared Reads.

units.name: CacheableIcRead
units.description: Instruction Cache Reads.

units.name: ChangeToX
units.description: Data Cache State Change Requests. Request change to writable, check L2 for current state.

units.name: L2HwPf
units.description: L2 Prefetcher. All prefetches accepted by L2 pipeline, hit or miss. Types of PF and L2 hit/miss broken out in a separate perfmon event

units.name: Group2. Read-write
units.description: MiscRequests. Various Noncacheable requests. Non-cached Data Reads, Non- cached Instruction Reads, Self-modifying code checks.

name: L2CacheReqStat
summary: Core to L2 Cacheable Request Access Status
description: L2 Cache Request Outcomes (not including L2 Prefetch).

units.name: LsRdBlkCS
units.description: Data Cache Shared Read Hit in L2.

units.name: LsRdBlkLHitX
units.description: Data Cache Read Hit in L2.

units.name: LsRdBlkLHitS
units.description: Data Cache Read Hit Non-Modifiable Line in L2.

units.name: LsRdBlkX
units.description: Data Cache Store or State Change Hit in L2.

units.name: LsRdBlkC
units.description: Data Cache Req Miss in L2.

units.name: IcFillHitX
units.description: Instruction Cache Hit Modifiable Line in L2.

units.name: IcFillHitS
units.description: Instruction Cache Hit Non-Modifiable Line in L2.

units.name: IcFillMiss
units.description: Instruction Cache Req Miss in L2.

name: L2PfHitL2
description: Counts all L2 prefetches accepted by L2 pipeline which hit in the L2 cache.

units.description: L1Region
